bio: Maciej is an enthusiast of web technologies, especially Single Page Apps, Progressive Web Apps, microservices and Internet of Things. Author of articles about JavaScript, NodeJS, and Angular. Creator of @ng-toolkit opensource project - set of tools for expanding existing Angular applications.
name: Maciej Treder
shortBio: Maciej is an enthusiast of web technologies, especially Single Page Apps, Progressive Web Apps, microservices and Internet of Things. Author of articles about JavaScript, NodeJS and Angular. Creator of @ng-toolkit opensource project - set of tools for expanding existing Angular applications.
title: Senior Software Development Engineer
